00011         Noise::Noise(float min, float max, int waveLength)
00012         {
00013             this->min = min;
00014             this->max = max;
00015             this->waveLength = waveLength;
00016 
00017             seed();
00018         }
00019 
00020         Noise::~Noise()
00021         {
00022         }
00023 
00024         void Noise::seed()
00025         {
00026             current = MathManager::getInstance()->randFloat(min, max);
00027             next = MathManager::getInstance()->randFloat(min, max);
00028 
00029             position = 0;
00030         }
00031 
00032         float Noise::nextValue()
00033         {
00034             float t = (float) position / (float) waveLength;
00035 
00036             float value = ((current + next) + (current - next) *
00037                     (float) cos(M_PI * t)) * 0.5f; 
00038 
00039             position++;
00040             if(position >= waveLength) {
00041                 position = 0;
00042                 current = next;
00043                 next = MathManager::getInstance()->randFloat(min, max);
00044             }
00045 
00046             return value;
00047         }
00048     }
00049 }
